title: '6' Decal
description: Placeable decorative decals.

title: Blaze Javelin Drill Array Tau
description: Improves the multi-tool's Blaze Javelin Weapon mode mining capability by a moderate amount.

infobox.desc: Improves the multi-tool's Blaze Javelin Weapon mode mining capability by a moderate amount.

title: Circles Hanging Lamp
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Combat Amplifier Tau
description:
Further increases damage of Mining Beam laser during combat.

Focuses laser optics to allow for more effective beam damage during moments of violence.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's Multi-tool inventory.

Stats Damage +1.0

title: Concrete Window Panel
description: A Concrete Window Panel for use in base construction.

title: Copper wire
description: Insulated copper wiring, suitable for use in a broad range of technologies, and all environments.

title: Drift Suspension
description:
Overhauls Exocraft handling values through a combination of software tweaks, pressure adjustments and the insertion of microgravity wells into key suspension components.

Specifically tuned to increase the ability of the Exocraft to drift.

title: Exocraft Mining Laser
description: A mining laser too cumbersome for handheld operation, they are found only installed on Exocraft.

title: Grenade Propulsion Tau
description:
Plasma Launcher grenades travel at high velocity. Device leads to quicker land mass deformation results, and faster destruction of lifeforms standing on or near targeted land mass.

Operates automatically once constructed within user's Multi-tool inventory

infobox.desc: Increase the speed of projectile grenades

title: Hanging Flag 2
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Metal Arch
description: A Metal Arch for use in base construction.

title: Metal Doorway
description: A thin metal doorway for use in base construction.

title: Pilgrim Geobay
description: An underground secure parking facility for the Pilgrim light Exocraft.

title: Polyphonic Core
description:
An attachment for the Multi-Tool Scanner that allows the device to detect and decode the cloaking signal of nearby Autophage units.

Use (20px/40px/40px) (PC/PS/XB) to activate the Scanner. As its detector waveform passes over the local area, it will automatically reveal any nearby Autophage entities.

In addition, this device can be used to locate Autophage settlements. Use Locate Autophage Camp to pinpoint a planetary gathering of Autophage.

infobox.desc: Reveals Autophage camps, NPCs, and sentience echoes.

title: Positron Ejector Coolant Theta
description: Reduces time between shots when using the Starship's Positron Ejector weapon mode by a large amount.

infobox.desc: Reduces time between shots when using the Starship's Positron Ejector weapon mode by a large amount.

title: Power Reservoir
description: High capacity power gel source. A hugely efficient device that optimises power storage within exosuit and starship inventories. Used in a wide variety of weapon and life support systems.

title: Pulse Spitter Accuracy Sigma
description: Increases accuracy of the Multi-tool's Pulse Spitter weapon mode by reducing the spread of the projectile by a small amount.

infobox.desc: Increases accuracy of the Multi-tool's Pulse Spitter weapon.

title: Radar Amplifier
description: Allows for additional building types to be acquired by the Exocraft Radar.

title: Rolled Canvas Pile
description: Buildable ornament to beautify your base.

title: Sloping Stone Panel
description:
Reinforced Stone building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Sloping Timber Roof Gable
description:
Reinforced Timber building module, widespread in basic structures across the galaxy.

Conforms to Universal Building Standards 2.3b, ensuring maximum compatibilty with other prefab structurs. Rapid Grid snapping allows for quick assembly of custom shelter layouts

title: Solar Mirror
description:
A specialist optical component. Employing an impossibly polished surface, this mirror is able to selectively filter different wavelengths of light, changing its reflective pattern based on nearby magnetic fields.

Used in the creation of a wide range of advanced technologies.

title: Solar Ray
description:
A highly specialised addition to the Multi-Tool's mining capabilities, transforming terrain deposits into liquid sun.

A powerful laser array amplifies local solar radiation, allowing for the rapid reconfiguration of nearby mineral ores.

title: Thermal Panels
description: A valuable piece of broken down Trade Terminal.

title: Voltaic Amplifier
description:
A generalised upgrade for all Multi-Tool weapon systems, causing its projectiles to resonate dramatically upon impact with any appropriate electromagnetic field.

Will significantly increase the damage dealt to any organic and inorganic entities that are currently stunned.

Stats: Damage stunned entities +21%

title: Waveform Recycler
description:
A powerful lateral processor inserted into the Multi-Tool Scanning System allows the device to recharge at a significantly improved rate.

Increase potential scan frequency.
